title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Spa Retreat with Luxurious Couple’s Treatment
description: Welcome to Circa 1928, New South Wales’ most luxurious new spa accommodation. Experience five-star pampering with a heavenly 90-minute couple’s spa treatment included and let your every need be taken care of with butler service throughout your stay. Choose to take your complimentary breakfast in your suite or in the Lounge, which you will return to each evening for a selection of gourmet snacks and wines. Also includes a complimentary mini bar with alcoholic beverages, a daily nightcap per person and more.

title: Mantra Albury Stay Near Winery & Craft Beer Trails
description: Discover a foodie’s paradise on the banks of the Murray River at the brand-new Mantra Albury. Stay in an upgraded Executive Studio and enjoy a vibrant regional escape with easy access to the area’s winery and craft beer trails, diverse local dining scene, gardens and galleries. Includes full daily buffet breakfast, a guided vineyard tour with wine tasting and matching cheese platter, a bottle of local wine, AU$50 food and beverage credit per room to spend at the on-site restaurant and a leisurely 1pm late checkout.

title: Boutique Albury Spa Retreat with A$200 Spa Credit & Daily Dining
description: Discover New South Wales' most luxurious new spa accommodation, Circa 1928 in Albury. Stay in this bold luxury hotel and spa housed inside an old bank to experience a regional escape like no other. Your retreat includes daily continental breakfast, plus afternoon tea, wine tasting and a nightcap each daily, A$200 spa credit to share, a one-time complimentary mini-bar stocked with alcoholic drinks, a welcome drink on arrival, two lunch vouchers for Zed Bar and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Boutique Albury Spa Retreat with A$200 Spa Credit & Daily Dining
description: Discover New South Wales' most luxurious new spa accommodation, the Circa 1928 in Albury. Stay in this bold new micro-luxury hotel and spa housed inside an old bank to experience a regional escape like no other. Your retreat includes a A$200 spa credit, daily breakfast and afternoon tea, daily local regional wine tasting, daily nightcap per person, a one-time complimentary mini-bar stocked with alcoholic beverages, a welcome drink on arrival, two lunch vouchers for Zed Bar and complimentary WiFi.

title: Contemporary Central Albury Escape Moments from Botanic Gardens with Onsite Restaurant
description: Experience the allure of this stunning hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of Albury's city centre. This contemporary hotel is a stone's throw from the Murray Art Museum Albury, where local and international artists showcase their work, and the leafy surrounds of the Albury Botanic Gardens. Indulge in a sumptuous meal at the onsite restaurant, District Dining, celebrating regional produce and wines, or explore the nearby Dean Street for a taste of Albury's vibrant dining scene. Venture further to Lake Hume for a day of water sports or a leisurely picnic by the water's edge.
offer_address: 524 Smollett Street, Albury, New South Wales 2640, Australia
